TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CallType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the type of procedure being invoked when calling the function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When you call the `CallByName` function, you can use the following `CallType` enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values. The `UseCallType` argument takes the `CallType` enumeration members.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.CallType Get = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A property value is being retrieved. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.CallType Let = int32(4)

Docs.summary: An Object property value is being determined. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.CallType Method = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A method is being invoked. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.CallType Set = int32(8)

Docs.summary: A property value is being determined. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .
